syncFldrName.description: The name of the folder containing the user's synchronized clippings.

syncClippings.description: The name of the feature for synchronizing clippings between applications or computers.

syncIntro.message: Sie können Ihre Textbausteine mit anderen Installationen von Thunderbird oder Firefox synchronisieren, indem Sie die auszutauschenden Textbausteine in einem speziellen Ordner »Synchronisierte Textbausteine« ablegen. Die synchronisierten Textbausteine werden in einer Datei auf Ihrem Rechner gespeichert. Das erfordert das Sync-Clippings-Hilfsprogramm.

syncIntroTB.message: Sie können Ihre Textbausteine mit anderen Installationen von Firefox oder Thunderbird synchronisieren, indem Sie die auszutauschenden Textbausteine in einem speziellen Ordner »Synchronisierte Textbausteine« ablegen. Die synchronisierten Textbausteine werden in einer Datei auf Ihrem Rechner gespeichert. Dies erfordert das Sync-Clippings-Hilfsprogramm.

syncLearnMore.message: Mehr über die Synchronisierung von Textbausteinen erfahren.

syncHelp.message:
Sync Clippings

Sync Clippings lets you synchronize a subset of your clippings between Firefox and Thunderbird, or other instances of those applications. You can choose which clippings you want to sync by creating them in a special “Synced Clippings” folder from the New Clipping dialog, or by moving them into the same folder in Clippings Manager.

The Synced Clippings folder will be automatically created once Sync Clippings is set up.

How to Set Up

The Sync Clippings Helper App needs to be installed to keep your Synced Clippings folder contents up to date. It is available for download from the AE Creations website. Once installed, it’ll be launched automatically when Firefox is started, and will run in the background.

To activate Sync Clippings, click Turn On Sync from the Clippings preferences page. You’ll be prompted to choose a file location on your system where the synced clippings data will be saved to. Repeat the setup in the other applications you want to sync your clippings with, selecting the same file location for the sync data.

syncHelpTB.message:
Sync Clippings

Sync Clippings lets you synchronize a subset of your clippings between Firefox and Thunderbird, or other instances of those applications. You can choose which clippings you want to sync by creating them in a special “Synced Clippings” folder from the New Clipping dialog, or by moving them into the same folder in Clippings Manager.

The Synced Clippings folder will be automatically created once Sync Clippings is set up.

How to Set Up

The Sync Clippings Helper App needs to be installed to keep your Synced Clippings folder contents up to date. It is available for download from the AE Creations website. Once installed, it’ll be launched automatically when Thunderbird is started, and will run in the background.

To activate Sync Clippings, click Turn On Sync from the Clippings preferences page. You’ll be prompted to choose a file location on your system where the synced clippings data will be saved to. Repeat the setup in the other applications you want to sync your clippings with, selecting the same file location for the sync data.
